subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Horse Racing
Soccer
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: A look at the day in sports, from the organizers of the 2012 Olympics beginning their countdown to the start of the Games, to a happy soccer player posing for his closeup.
